alert.note: Alert for Richmond; Scotland (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 07 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of central North Carolina, including the following counties, Richmond and Scotland. * WHEN...Until 630 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 459 PM EDT, Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen in the last 2 hours. Although rain has ended, creeks and streams remain elevated. This could cause minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sandhills Game Land. - This includes the following flood prone locations... Gum Swamp Creek & Dam. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
